title: (Thurs Full) Lunchbox Brings In The “Best Audio Ever Recorded”…He says he’s not Overhyping This!!! + Listener David Wants to Get Bobby’s Name Tattooed + Amy’s Crazy Expensive Water Bill
itunes:title: (Thurs Full) Lunchbox Brings In The “Best Audio Ever Recorded”…He says he’s not Overhyping This!!! + Listener David Wants to Get Bobby’s Name Tattooed + Amy’s Crazy Expensive Water Bill
description:
Lunchbox was out in public when something crazy went down that caused him to immediately pull out his phone and hit record. He claims it is the BEST audio ever recorded and is not joking. We hear it for ourselves. Listener David calls in and wants to see if he can meet Bobby at his comedy show next weekend and get his signature tattooed on his body! Amy was shocked to get a $600 water bill! We talk to listeners who also got crazy bills.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
